definition: to caress/to fondle/to look after (tenderly)/affectionate care
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor

sentences.english: Softly press to wear make-up, as the closest comfort from the lover.
sentences.chinese: 以輕壓方式上妝，彷彿戀人最親密的愛撫。

sentences.english: He nudged her gently. She nuzzled him back.
sentences.chinese: 他向她溫柔地推了推，她用鼻子愛撫他，欲擒故縱。

sentences.english: He canoodled her to agree to his request.
sentences.chinese: 他用各種愛撫的手段要她答應他的請求。

sentences.english: She is an affectionate child and loves to be hugged and kissed.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個多情的孩子，喜歡讓人愛撫親吻。

sentences.english: The baby went fast asleep with his mother's caresses.
sentences.chinese: 在母親的愛撫下，嬰兒很快就睡熟了。

sentences.english: What I needed was to be caressed by Fanfan's gentle gaze.
sentences.chinese: 我需要的是芳芳溫柔雙眸的愛撫。

sentences.english: Don't you feel happy and assured by the caress of your special someone?
sentences.chinese: 在你特別那位的愛撫下，難道你不感到幸福和自信嗎？

sentences.english: You're probably doing different things, like kissing, fondling, licking, etc…
sentences.chinese: 你們也許是不同的事情，比如接吻，愛撫，舔，等等。

sentences.english: Sometimes we didn't even know who was caressing whom.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，我們甚至都不知道是誰在愛撫誰。

sentences.english: Listening to the plaintive dirges sung out of friendship.
sentences.chinese: 在一千雙手的愛撫下，聽友情歌唱憂傷。

sentences.english: Clumsily, he caresses her swelling flesh and says he loves her. Will it have her eyes, depth-dark?
sentences.chinese: 笨拙地，他愛撫肉和頭部腫脹說他愛她。

sentences.english: Also includes the caress and so on many Fan Chuan.
sentences.chinese: 還包括性愛撫等許多範川。
她用鼻子愛撫了一下它的臉頰。

sentences.english: So what is the best way to touch a woman?
sentences.chinese: 那麼什麼是愛撫女人的最好的方法呢？

sentences.english: In fact, relationships between mortals invariably include conflict as well as canoodling.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，兩性關係總是包括衝突和親熱愛撫。

sentences.english: I feel my limbs are made glorious by the touch of this world of life.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我的四肢因受到生命世界的愛撫而熠熠生輝。

definition: Horse-Face, one of the two guardians of the underworld in Chinese mythology
to tackle a difficult job (idiom)/to do sth reluctantly
to have tender affection for/to love tenderly/to pamper sb
fig. restless, because of fear or strong emotions
from the inside to the outside/through and through/thoroughly
